mapper.select: SELECT file_id AS fileId, ref_id AS refId, file_role AS fileRole, file_url AS fileUrl, original_name AS originalName FROM et_file WHERE ref_type = #{refType} AND ref_id = #{refId} AND file_role = #{fileRole} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY file_id ASC
SELECT file_id AS fileId, ref_type AS refType, ref_id AS refId, file_role AS fileRole, file_url AS fileUrl, original_name AS originalName FROM et_file WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO et_file ( ref_type, ref_id, file_url, file_role, original_name, stored_name, file_type, file_path ) VALUES ( #{refType}, #{refId}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileRole}, #{originalName}, #{storedName}, #{fileType}, #{filePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE et_file SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE file_id = #{fileId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
